item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I’m Mario Rom√°n. I study Mathematics and Computer science in Granada. I also write in LibreIM. GitHub: @M42. CV: My CV on Github pages. Email: mromang08+blog@gmail.com All the articles in this page are licensed in Creative Commons BY-SA 2.0 unless otherwise specified. The theme of this blog was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie. It is powered by Emacs org-mode and Hugo.
